Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. After careful consideration of its value and your anticipated use, I propose a special offer for this exceptional item. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire it for $9,500. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that make this product stand out. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am confident that this investment will prove to be highly beneficial for you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
